.. _singularity_key_list:

singularity key list
--------------------

List keys in your local keyring

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  List your local keys in your keyring. Will list public (trusted) keys
  by default.

::

  singularity key list

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity key list
    $ singularity key list --secret

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help     help for list
  -s, --secret   list private keys instead of the default which displays public ones

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity key <singularity_key>` 	 - Manage OpenPGP keys

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 12-May-2020*
